abstract: United States District Court Judge Colleen McMahon rules that Metropolitan Transportation Authority was wrong to bar New York City subway advertisements for documentary film The Muslims Are Coming!; says ads are not political in nature.
lead_paragraph: Colleen McMahon of United States District Court in Manhattan reversed a decision by the Metropolitan Transportation Authority, saying the agency had no grounds to conclude that the advertisements were political.

headline.main: Judge Allows Ads in City Subways for Muslim Comedy
headline.print_headline: Judge Allows Ads in Subways for Muslim Comedy

snippet: Colleen McMahon of United States District Court in Manhattan reversed a decision by the Metropolitan Transportation Authority, saying the agency had no grounds to conclude that the advertisements were political.
